entities.name: dedalus
entities.description: Dedalus is the one who has a pocket watch and is explaining the plan to Uncle Vernon. He says 'You know how to drive, I take it?'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being underage and that using magic in his house could provide the Ministry with an excuse to arrest him.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the one who is supposed to drive, but he seems to be losing confidence in the plan. He says 'Know how to â€” ? Of course I ruddy well know how to drive!'

entities.name: hestia
entities.description: Hestia is mentioned as someone who does not hear Uncle Vernon's muttering under his breath.

relationships.description: Dedalus is explaining the plan to Uncle Vernon, saying 'We shall be leaving before Harry does...'
Dedalus mentions that they will leave before Harry, implying a relationship between them.
Uncle Vernon is being told by Dedalus to drive, saying 'You know how to drive, I take it?'
